channel.title: gatathed on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in gatathed on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Gaurav Tathed
item.description: Gaurav is pursuing Bachelors’s Degree in Physics and Astronomy for the University of Waterloo. In the Spring 2020 term, he is working in the QITI group as an undergraduate co-op student. Gaurav is using COMSOL software to investigate noise sources in ion-traps, in particular the thermal effect of radio-frequency voltages on the trapping apparatus.
